roleset.name: (cause) anxiety or stress, anxious
roleset.note: DISTRESS-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from distress.01-v)
DISTRESSED-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on SHARP-SRED. (from distressed.01-j)

example.name: stressed out
example.text: ...if something had distressed me, a small thing had become a huge thing and I could n't le it go and I could n't forgive myself and I could n't get out of myself and I just could n't let *PRO* go.
